title: Weekends & Person you met at a party

singleItemContent: What do you usually do on weekends? Do you study or work?
What did you do last weekends?
Do you make plans for your weekends?
Describe a person you met at a party who you enjoyed talking with
And explain why you enjoyed talking with him/her
What types of party do people have, and why are parties important?
Why do you think some people like parties but others hate them?
Do you think parties will become more popular in the future?
